extension.description: Access Radio Deejay's reloaded shows from Kodi. Radio DeeJay is an Italian radio station. It was founded on 1 February 1982 by the Italian radio and television personality Claudio Cecchetto and was acquired by the Gruppo Editoriale L'Espresso in 1989 (which also owns DeeJay TV, Repubblica Radio TV, m2o and Radio Capital).
